# Results

```{r}
#| label: fig-result
#| fig-cap: "Here's a figure"

ggplot2::ggplot(mtcars, ggplot2::aes(x=hp, y=mpg, color=as.factor(cyl))) +
    ggplot2::geom_point(size=3) +
    ggplot2::scale_color_discrete(name="Number of\ncylinders")

```
